Giants put Game 163 tickets on sale, with playoff picture still undecided

The San Francisco Giants will put tickets for a potential Game 163, in the event of a division tie, on sale at 6 p.m. Saturday. The Giants have won 106 games, matching the franchise record, but have yet to wrap up the NL West.
The Blue Angels are returning to San Francisco for Fleet Week

Fleet Week takes flight in San Francisco starting Sunday, but fans of the Blue Angels will have to wait for the end of the week. In addition to the air show, concerts, ship tours and a display of military emergency assistance gear will be featured.
